title: Update browser tab title to Aswin-Resume

requirements.text: Update the browser-tab site title text to exactly "Aswin-Resume" by changing the HTML document <title> in frontend/index.html.
acceptanceCriteria: When the app is opened in a browser, the tab title displays exactly "Aswin-Resume".
No other UI text (e.g., navigation/site header title) is changed as part of this update.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Changing the site header/navigation title or other on-page branding text.
Adding new pages, sections, or features.
